item.title: Pioneering advisor conference comes to Miami Beach with volatility, crypto and AI as hot topics
item.description: This is the fifth Future Proof conference, and the first in Miami following conferences in Huntington Beach, Ca.

item.title: Tesla gets a price target cut from Mizuho, which warns of softening EV sales
item.description: Last week, the company warned it could face fresh headwinds due to retaliatory tariffs from countries responding to Trump's slate of duties.

item.title: How activist Mantle Ridge's presence at Cognizant can help lift the company's valuation
item.description: Signals suggest that Mantle Ridge likes Cognizant's new leadership and supports the board's actions. The Street may come to appreciate the stock.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 stocks for the long term
